title: Brazil : number of Facebook users 2017 to 2023
summary: Overall Number of users in millions has increased over the Year.
Number of users in millions is slightly increasing from 2021 to 2023.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2021 and 2022.
Maximum Number of users in millions, about 91.5 was reported at Year 2023
The lowest Number of users in millions, of value 86.1 was reported at Year 2021
